content: नाडिः, --डी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The tubular stalk of any plant. {@--2@} The hollow stalk of a lotus &c. {@--3@} Any tubular organ of the body (such as an artery, vein); षडधिदशनाडीचक्रमध्यस्थितात्मा <ls>Māl. 5. 1</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 5.">2.</ls> {@--4@} A pipe, flute. {@--5@} A fistulous sore, fistula, sinus. {@--6@} The pulse at the hand or foot. {@--7@} A measure of time equal to twenty-four minutes. {@--8@} A period of time =(1/2) Muhūrta. {@--9@} A sort of bent grass. {@--10@} A juggling trick.
